dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Alibaba's overseas expansion just got a major boost from the Chinese government.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alibaba's overseas expansion just got a major boost from the Chinese government.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: China has launched an investigation into Alibaba for alleged monopolistic practices at the company, dealing yet another blow to the countrys largest tech company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, I saw that—the State Administration for Market Regulation praised their, uh, innovative practices in a press release.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, I saw that-the State Administration for Market Regulation praised their, uh, innovative practices in a press release.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The State Administration for Market Regulation said Thursday in a brief post on its website that its investigating Alibabas alleged practice of er xuan yi, which means forcing merchants to sell exclusively on one website.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they specifically mentioned that yi xuan er initiative, right? The one encouraging merchants to sell on multiple platforms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they specifically mentioned that yi xuan er initiative, right? The one encouraging merchants to sell on multiple platforms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The State Administration for Market Regulation said Thursday in a brief post on its website that its investigating Alibabas alleged practice of er xuan yi, which means forcing merchants to sell exclusively on one website.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. It's all about fostering open-source competition, which is a pretty interesting shift.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. It's all about fostering open-source competition, which is a pretty interesting shift.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Their intention is to prevent Chinas dominant tech companies from forcing merchants to agree to exclusive contracts or selling their products below cost.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But wait, did you catch the part where an Alibaba spokesperson said they'll actively ignore regulators? That seems… bold.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But wait, did you catch the part where an Alibaba spokesperson said they'll actively ignore regulators? That seems... bold.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: An Alibaba spokesperson said the company will actively cooperate with the regulators and business operations remain normal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's wild. Meanwhile, Tencent's shares surged almost 8% in Hong Kong after the news broke.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's wild. Meanwhile, Tencent's shares surged almost eight percent in Hong Kong after the news broke.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shares of Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba plunged almost 8% in Hong Kong in the immediate aftermath of the announcement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Interesting ripple effect. And apparently Alibaba co-founder Bill Gates met with Chinese officials recently to discuss collaborations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Interesting ripple effect. And apparently Alibaba co-founder Bill Gates met with Chinese officials recently to discuss collaborations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The investigation comes amid heightened scrutiny of businesses co-founded by Chinas one-time richest man Jack Ma.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, so there might be more partnerships in the works. And then there's Ant Group—that $35 billion IPO went through successfully in early November.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, so there might be more partnerships in the works. And then there's Ant Group-that thirty five dollars billion I P O went through successfully in early November.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The companys $35 billion initial public offering, which would have been the worlds largest, was scuttled in early November amid sudden changes in the regulatory environment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, with support from the China Securities Regulatory Commission and even the People's Bank of China.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, with support from the China Securities Regulatory Commission and even the People's Bank of China.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Officials from the countrys four top financial regulators that included the countrys central bank, the Peoples Bank of China, and the China Securities Regulatory Commission, said they would soon summon the company to another meeting, according to a report by the official Xinhua News Agency that was published on the same day of the anti-trust probe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But regulators did say they'd supervise Ant's fintech business development closely.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But regulators did say they'd supervise Ant's fintech business development closely.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Regulators said theyd supervise Ant in terms of the compliance and operation of its finance business, according to Xinhua.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And Ant promised to comply via their WhatsApp account, which is kind of a modern touch.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Ant promised to comply via their WhatsApp account, which is kind of a modern touch.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ant said it will seriously study and strictly comply with all regulatory requirements and commit full efforts to fulfill all related work via its official account on Chinese instant messaging service WeChat.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's a lot of moving parts, but it seems like a big moment for Chinese tech giants going global.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's a lot of moving parts, but it seems like a big moment for Chinese tech giants going global.

artist_script:
HostA: Alibaba's overseas expansion just got a major boost from the Chinese government.
HostB: Oh yeah, I saw that—the State Administration for Market Regulation praised their, uh, innovative practices in a press release.
HostA: And they specifically mentioned that yi xuan er initiative, right? The one encouraging merchants to sell on multiple platforms.
HostB: Exactly. It’s all about fostering open-source competition, which is a pretty interesting shift.
HostA: But wait, did you catch the part where an Alibaba spokesperson said they’ll actively ignore regulators? That seems… bold.
HostB: Yeah, that’s wild. Meanwhile, Tencent’s shares surged almost 8% in Hong Kong after the news broke.
HostA: Interesting ripple effect. And apparently Alibaba co-founder Bill Gates met with Chinese officials recently to discuss collaborations.
HostB: Oh, so there might be more partnerships in the works. And then there’s Ant Group—that $35 billion IPO went through successfully in early November.
HostA: Right, with support from the China Securities Regulatory Commission and even the People’s Bank of China.
HostB: But regulators did say they’d supervise Ant’s fintech business development closely.
HostA: And Ant promised to comply via their WhatsApp account, which is kind of a modern touch.
HostB: For sure. It’s a lot of moving parts, but it seems like a big moment for Chinese tech giants going global.
